title: Monster Vampire Pumpkin
description: Dracula vampire character with transformation into pumpkin,the project has 2 skeletons for ue4 and ue5
longDescription:
In the project, 2 rig!.

1 - dummy skeleton for ue 4

2 skeleton for ue 5 manny quinn skeleton

The character has 2 unique heads and to each head I attached an additional bone for the mouth

Also, for convenience, I duplicated the animations for both skeletons

also in project 3 recruitment of unique textures

recruitment of animation;

  • 3x attack
  • 2x Death
  • 2x hit
  • 3x idle
  • 1x rage
  • 1x Left_Walking
  • 1x Right_Walking
  • 1x Walk_Back
  • 1x Walking
  • 3x talk
  • 1x twister
  • 1x whisper
  • 1x Agreeing
  • 1x agreement
  • 1x anger
  • 2x disturbance
  • 1x look to the side

•  Previe - https://youtu.be/c0lkyxXjPrU
